name: Verify invalid authentication with incorrect username or password
scenarioId: BooksAPICRUD:Verify invalid authentication with incorrect username or password
methodName: Verify invalid authentication with incorrect username or password

testSteps.description: 1: Verify invalid authentication with incorrect username or password ({username=invalidUser, password=password123})

children.description: Given User tries to authenticate with username "invalidUser" and password "password123"
When User sends a request to retrieve books

restQuery.responseHeaders:
WWW-Authenticate: Basic realm="Realm"
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=C505B69ABF116F18441800336FF65C5F; Path=/; HttpOnly
WWW-Authenticate: Basic realm="Realm"
Content-Length: 0
Date: Sat, 29 Mar 2025 18:36:07 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

children.description: Then The response status code should be 401
